annotation.summary: Creates a magical shield of fire that grants cold resistance, immunity to environmental cold, and functions as a normal shield with specific stats and reactive fire damage.
annotation.action_economy: Can Raise a Shield as a normal shield; can use the Shield Block reaction.
annotation.prerequisites: Ability to cast or create the fire shield effect.

annotation.summary: The caster extracts a known or random memory from a target's mind and projects it as a holographic audiovisual display lasting up to five minutes, showing the memory exactly as the target experienced it.
annotation.action_economy: 1 action (casting time not explicitly stated, assumed standard spellcasting action)
annotation.prerequisites: Ability to cast the spell; awareness of a specific memory of the target or GM-determined random memory

annotation.summary: A mental effect that halts the target's bodily movement by interfering with its motor impulses, requiring the target to make a Will saving throw.
annotation.prerequisites: Ability to cast or use mental control effects

annotation.summary: Creates a shimmering bubble of runes that blocks perception, detection, and scrying between those inside and outside, though movement through it is unhindered. The caster can reduce its radius in 10-foot increments.
annotation.action_economy: standard action or casting time as defined by the spell
annotation.prerequisites: ability to cast spells or use effects that create magical barriers or illusions

annotation.summary: The effect reveals the precise location and plane of existence of a chosen creature or object. It requires a personal connection to the target and can bypass weaker detection protections.
annotation.action_economy: varies by casting time (typically 1 action or longer, depending on system)
annotation.prerequisites: Must have seen the creature, possess a significant belonging or body part of it, or have touched or possess a fragment of the object.

annotation.summary: A spell or ritual that takes one minute to cast, has a variable range depending on the specific effect, and lasts as long as the caster continues to sustain it.
annotation.prerequisites: Ability to cast spells or perform rituals

annotation.summary: While the spell lasts, the caster can use a special Shield Block reaction with a magical shield that has Hardness 5. This reaction can reduce damage from any spell or magical effect, not just physical attacks. After using the reaction, the spell ends and cannot be recast for 10 minutes.
annotation.prerequisites: Must have the spell active; can only be used once per casting; cannot recast for 10 minutes after use.

annotation.summary: At 4th level, the spell generates a 10-foot aura around the touched creature that completely blocks sound within and through it, affecting all creatures inside the area similarly to the target.
annotation.action_economy: Varies by base spell; typically 2 actions to cast
annotation.prerequisites: Must be able to cast the base version of the spell and heighten it to 4th level

annotation.summary: Creates a magical gravitational singularity in an unoccupied 5-foot square that pulls nearby creatures and unsecured objects within 50 feet toward it, compressing those drawn into its center. Movement toward the singularity depends on each creature's Reflex save, with closer targets affected first and potentially blocking others.
annotation.action_economy: Cast a spell (likely 2 or 3 actions, depending on system)
annotation.prerequisites: Ability to cast the spell; an unoccupied 5-foot square within range
